intro: Tillandsia eizii, commonly known as the "Blue Ghost" or "Blue Tillandsia," is a member of the Bromeliaceae family. It is an epiphytic air plant native to Mexico, particularly in the states of Chiapas and Oaxaca. This species is characterized by its striking blue-gray foliage, which is covered in a dense layer of trichomes that help it absorb moisture and nutrients from the air. Tillandsia eizii thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires regular misting to maintain its health. Its unique appearance and low maintenance make it a popular choice for indoor gardening.
